name: GateTail
description:
Welcome to GateTail!


GateTail is a colorful action-adventure strategy RPG with a comedic story-rich basis and multiple endings based on your choices and potential to boot! Join ..., (yes that's her real name?) as she explores an alternate dimension to her own known only as GateTail in the search for a lost friend who entered this strange world JUST before you!

You won't be alone, however, as within this strange land lies swaggy birds, magically powerful humans, dinosaurs, dragons, glitchy trees, and even GateTail's supreme overlord and TOTAL jerk, Fred the Frog himself! The ONLY thing that makes these threats similar in ANY way is that they ALL want you dead and will come to MANY DIFFERENT conclusions on how to get the MOST use out of you possible!

Do YOU have what it takes to make it through GateTail's combat, challenges, puzzles, and more in order to FIND your lost friend and UNLOCK your true potential while doing so, learning more about this dimension's RICH history and lore!?

Well, there's only one way to find out, now is there?


Features:

- 10+ choice-based endings (+Well ending)

- Vastly unique and varied locations (Have you ever walked through the source code of a game before?)

- 200+ enemies (Watch out for Randy.)

- Tons of different minigames & mechanics (There's a fishing one in this game.)

- Diverse & interesting characters (& Jackson.)

- Varied and challenging boss fights (Without relying on RNG!)

- Horror elements (That you can disable.)

- Comedy (Ah yes.)

- Gambling (WE CANT HAVE THIS IN OUR 13+ (simulated gambling) GAME.)





As you can see, GateTail's a VAST and VARIED world ready for YOU! (and you specifically.)

Ribbit, ribbit.
